storyInfo:
Zoya escapes from the occupied school, meets her father's colleagues along the way, and learns about the state of Chernobog.
She does not know if her mother still lives, and her father has gone to Peterheim Middle School to rescue the students.

attributes.content: The stories tell us that evil never triumphs over good.
Most of the time, I take this as a matter of course.
Do you really have to go?
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: I saw the news. Things are heating up between the mob and the police.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: I saw blood. Lots of people bleeding...
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Don't worry, honey, things aren't that bad.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: It's just the media playing things up. 'If it bleeds, it leads,' you know. That's how they get paid.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Don't let them scare you.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: The man at the smoke shop says not so many nobles come by for liquor anymore. And Aunt Nina, who works at Lord Santelli's estate, came home. She says the Lord's entire staff is furloughed.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Don't you think... don't you think that means——
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: ...Sorry. I shouldn't have raised my voice.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Loban, I'm just... I'm just so worried.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: I said not to worry. Don't be scared. I'm here. You can trust me. I will protect you.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: And it's not only me. I have the rest of the Guard garrison with me, and the Army is just outside the city too. There's nothing to be afraid of.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Loban...
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Relax, Darya. We swore to protect this city, and this home.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Let's not trouble your pretty little head. This winter will pass, and when the weather warms up, we'll go someplace nice. How does that sound?
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: And don't tell Zoya. Let it be just the two of us, off on a romantic getaway. Alright?
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: ...hehe.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: How are you still like this, even at your age?
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: It's so cold. Where are we going to go for a romantic getaway when the snow melts and the roads turn to mud?
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Isn't that the perfect way to end the winter? When the time comes, we'll go dancing, you'll bring some mead from home, and I'll bake you cookies myself.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Oho, bold words. Do you still remember how? I think... we could. Just wait for Zoya to go back to school. When she's safely in her dormitory, we'll head off.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Sure! Now, how long until school starts? Could we move her in early?
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Nonsense!
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: Zoya? We were just talking about you. Come, your father's on the night shift. Say goodbye.
attributes.name: Woman

attributes.content: There were happy moments that at the time erupted suddenly with such potency, they brought an unparalleled sense of being.
Or maybe they felt very ordinary. Only in retrospect do I realize what the feeling was.
Everyday conversations for a monotonous life.
As if spring would come as usual. As if the snow would melt, the people would tie the hay into straw men, and trample about the mud amidst the aroma of pale mead.
The usual greetings: good morning, good evening, hello, goodbye.
Until that day——
Our city, before our very eyes, twisted, deformed, erupted.
Ahead left, clear.
Now.
No signal. Can't make contact.
Phew. I have their patrol routes figured out, so I should be fine here. Just need to get over the fence...
I'll make it this time!
(What? Someone's coming! This isn't on the patrol route... I have to hide.)
(Inaudible).
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: (Excited, but still inaudible).
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: (I should be okay hiding here for a while.)
(That sounded like those guys who call themselves 'Reunion.' And it was a bunch of them... The one on the left doesn't look the same as the ones I see on patrol.)
(What is going on? They come out of nowhere and lock us all up in the school. What do they even want?)
(They're coming this way!)
What is Mephisto thinking?
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Would he really volunteer to take over? He wants to deal with the students over there? Not sure I believe he's that kind-hearted.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: They rounded up most of the noble kids along with all the others at Peterheim. Why go that far?
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: That school is a ways away from the one they stationed us at. And if Mephisto is up to something, there's not much we can do...
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: *Sigh*, I hope he can stay focused on the big picture. We don't want him screwing around.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Who knows what goes on in that psychopathic little head of his? Maybe he does it on purpose!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: He's a freak! A monster!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Hey, calm down. Don't forget, we're on the same team...
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: What do you mean calm down? Did you not see what he was doing with his Arts last time? That shit's straight-up evil!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Lower your voice!
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Does he even think we're on the same team? Bullshit!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I told you to quiet down! Don't spook the students!
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Damn it!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Sorry. I let it get to me.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I get it. I know how you feel. Who doesn't?
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Honestly, I think about killing Mephisto sometimes. If it wasn't for the Captain, I'd go kill him right now!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Don't talk like that. You think I don't want to kill him? You think the Captain doesn't?
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: But we can't. He's our people. And we don't kill our own people. That's at the core of our movement.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: But yeah, it's normal to be angry.... with what he did this time.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: We watched his men, running wild, tearing everything up. Are we thugs who break into houses, kill people, set fires?
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: (Who is Mephisto?)
(Are they talking about... killing people?!)
(Did I hear that right? They didn't do anything to the students. Why...?)
Hah, well said. Are we not thugs then?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Maybe the Captain's troops aren't. But if you ask me, we're not exactly doing good for this city.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: How many blocks have we leveled? How many people have we dragged out of their homes and killed in the street? It's a mess out there. We all know.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: We have no choice. The people out there can't tell who belongs to whose squad. They don't care.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: As long as any of 'our people' are doing those things, then the people here will see us all as thugs.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Rolena, you're back. Are you ready for the handover?
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: All ready.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Good. The Captain is on a tight schedule with this new job from the leadership. Your teams are doing final cleanup on the suppressed districts.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: And you'll want to keep an eye on the Sarkaz mercenaries.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Oh, and look after the students. The Captain is keeping them here. Don't hurt them, but don't let them escape either.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Understood. If the cubs behave, I'm happy to let things be, but what if they act out?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Just try not to hurt them.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: But what if I have to? What if some of them can use Arts? If they fight back, we'll have to take action.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Rolena, I know what you mean. You've got fire in you. But don't get out of hand. This is an order from the Captain.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Keep your emotions under control. Don't let them overpower your judgment.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Hah. If it's from the Captain, I will abide.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I hope so.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: We'll start the transfer in thirty minutes. Then this place is your responsibility... What exactly that means is up to you.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Up to me? Will you be able to sleep at night?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I said I'll abide, but I don't handle it all personally. Threats, intimidation, and terror make people behave. We'll do what it takes...
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Hey, I'm just kidding. Don't look at me like that. I know what I have to do.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Whew, you said all that way too easy.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Seriously, I don't care about the plan or whatever. Have you thought about where we're going to end up if this city goes down?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: We never had anywhere to go.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: No. We can go anywhere. Someday, we'll be able to go anywhere we want.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: That'd be nice. You think that day will really come?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: (What are they talking about? Who are they?)
(What's so funny? Those bastards. They come out of nowhere and occupy the city. They imprison us here, and for what?)
(And it looks like this goes way beyond the school...)
(Dammit, what's happening outside then?)
(I can't stay here anymore. I have to get back.)
(Mom, Dad...)
(They didn't see me. Now's my chance...!)
Hm?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Did you hear that...?
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Hear what?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Strange...
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Anyway, that's the deal. It's up to you now.
attributes.name: Reunion Squad Leader

attributes.content: Go on already. Don't let us hold up your mission.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: He's gone.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Yeah. He has his job, now we have ours.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: What's ours? Didn't he just say your job is to watch those students and don't let them out?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Right. What's your point?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Don't be play dumb. You really didn't notice?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I thought I was the only one.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Looks like you've been doing well under the Captain. And that training sharpened you up good. Better than I expected.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Don't mince words.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Fine. I don't like to beat around the bush either.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Would you believe me if I said I let that schoolgirl get away on purpose?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: You really think I'm that stupid?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Turns out you're not.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Say, didn't I hear that you're from around here?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: What's it to you? I know you are too. I've seen you in the Old Quarter, Rolena the Tailor.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: But what does it matter? We're both Infected now.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: And we all know what we've done. So who cares where we're from?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: ...Do you know what would have happened to that girl if I just grabbed her?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I figure I'd have to break a leg or two to teach her to stay in her room. Would that have gone against orders? Would that have been a bridge too far?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Hah. You're a real hardass.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Or I could have just killed her. The Captain's team is gone anyway. Besides the guerillas, who's going to care if I kill a student or two?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: She could be an example to the other kids.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: You wouldn't do that. You wouldn't go against the Captain's orders.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: The group under the old man, Patriot, they've had a rough go of it too, huh? Those kids have made a lot of noise for them over the past week.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: If we don't do something, the students won't know fear, and we'll have the bolder ones looking to get out every other day.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: They don't know what it's like outside. They don't know how bad it's gotten.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: And aside from the few noble kids, what good are they to the movement?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: The Captain told us to keep the school under control. Was that just to protect the little cubs?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Why are we even talking about this?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Come on, didn't you just let that girl go? It's because you were afraid I'd catch her and do something to her, right?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Just come out with it.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I'm curious. Do you feel for the people here?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: No matter how they treated you before, how they treated your brothers, just because you were Infected... You don't hate them?
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: No, I can tell from your tone. You do hate them.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Cut the crap! I just don't think a schoolgirl can cause that much trouble, even if she wanders around the campus.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: That's all.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I think you actually believe your own bullshit.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: What bullshit? Don't change the subject. You saw that girl too!
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: So, since you're such a ruthless killer, why didn't you drag her out and beat her to a pulp?
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I'm not like you.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Oh? Can't even own up to it——
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: I'm not like you. I'm not you.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I didn't drag her out precisely because I know she's not just wandering around the school.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: It's clear as day. That girl's trying to escape.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Once she gets out of the campus and our 'controlled' area, she'll find a place that's not so peaceful.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: ...Wait.
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Why the hell didn't you stop her?! If she gets out, she's gonna, she's gonna...
attributes.name: Reunion Soldier

attributes.content: Yep. She's walking into her own grave.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: Why should I stop her? Even if I caught her, I couldn't do anything. Captain's orders.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: So I let her go.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I told you, I'm not like you. You're still soft. Even now, you're worried about those kids.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: But me? I can't forget what me and my family suffered at the hands of this city.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I hate them all.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I hope that girl doesn't die too quickly. Haha! Open your eyes and take a good look at the suffering around you.
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: I've never seen this side of the city.
Houses destroyed, roads blocked, windows sealed up, broken bricks strewn across the street like so many toy blocks.
Smoke rises from the fires all around me, carrying sorrowful wails on the wind.
All while the armed men cheer, carving their symbols on every surface they can find. I hear their name. The murderers say it with pride.
They call themselves——Reunion.
...Agh, it hurts...
(It takes about two hours to get from school to the center city? Give or take?)
(I can't hear anything. That should be temporary. And I can't feel my left hand... looks like my little finger is broken too. Hrm...)
(There's a sharp pain in my abdomen. But it's no big deal yet.
(Don't panic, Zoya. You made it this far. Just keep carrying on like this. Don't rush it. Most important thing is to stay hidden from the bad guys...)
(Another explosion. I think it came from the park this time.)
(How many times is that now?!)
(What the hell happened...?! Where are the police? Where's the military? Why has nobody come to restore order yet?)
(Looks like I can't get through ahead. And those people fighting look like Reunion? Who's fighting against them...?)
Damn. I'm almost home. Why does it have to be now?!
Run!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Those bastards! They're monsters! Monsters!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: (The crowd is out of control. More panicked than usual...)
Um, what's happening over——
Get out of my way!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: What are you doing? Run already!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: My baby! Where's my baby?!
attributes.name: Ursus Woman

attributes.content: They're coming! Shit! Hurry!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Wahhh, Mama... Mamaaa...
attributes.name: Ursus Child

attributes.content: Look out!
(Agh, my wound. That hurt...)
Are you okay?
Waaaahhh! Waahhhh! Let go! Let me go!
attributes.name: Ursus Child

attributes.content: Hey, wait!
Fall back!
attributes.name: Ursus Police

attributes.content: (Finally, the police! Now we'll be okay.)
There's a situation up ahead. This block is now on lockdown!
attributes.name: Ursus Police

attributes.content: Hey! Do you have a deathwish?! Turn back! There's Reunion that way!
attributes.name: Ursus Police

attributes.content: ...Hold on, aren't you Zoya? What are you doing here?!
attributes.name: Ursus Police

attributes.content: Uncle Valery!
What in the world is going on? Who the hell are these Reunion people? And where is everyone?
Let us through!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: You have to let us out! They're killing people! You're the police, you have to know what to do!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Don't panic! Calm down. We're going to——
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Uncle Valery!
I'm okay...
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Don't push! Stop! I said calm the hell down!
attributes.name: Ursus Police

attributes.content: What are the cops good for?! You useless shits, go put a stop to those Infected!
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: They're coming! They're going to kill us——
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Hey! That's enough!
Get out of my way! I don't wanna die...
attributes.name: Ursus Civilian

attributes.content: Stop them!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: How could they do...! Uncle Valery, are you okay?
I'm fine. The people are all in a panic these days. We see this a lot. We're almost used to it.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: But why...
Doesn't matter. I don't have much time to talk with you.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: I have to stop these civilians. It's too dangerous up ahead. Those people out there are monsters. They're nothing like the normal Infected.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Anton, get your team over there!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Ursus Police

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Anyway, what are you doing here, Zoya? And how did you get here?
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: I heard their warlord say that students would be kept locked up in their schools.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: And yours is pretty far from here. How did... Never mind. Doesn't matter. You need to come with me. It's too dangerous here.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Wait, Uncle, you still didn't tell me what happened!
I came through the alleys, hiding from the bad men, and things just kept getting crazier the farther I went.
There were explosions everywhere. Buildings collapsed. So many injured people. I saw them setting fires. How could they do this?
My family... is Dad fighting Reunion too? Where is he? And where's Mom? I have to find——
Wh... why aren't you saying anything...?
Uncle Valery, are my parents...?
...Your father is safe.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Really?!
But——
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Your neighborhood was one of the first to be attacked.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Those Infected, the Reunion people, they devastated every district they entered. We had no choice but to prioritize evacuating civilians in high-risk areas.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Your father and I... we both agreed on this.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: We had to look at the situation and make appropriate judgments. It's our responsibility. There were trade-offs.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: ...By the time the rescue team reached your block, things were already beyond saving.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: It was a disaster. It's hard to imagine how anything like that happened.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Everything had been melted. Grass, bricks, steel beams, everything. Not even snow could touch the scorched earth.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: I won't tell you your mother might have escaped. You're a smart kid. I can't lie to you.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: I'm sorry. We were too late.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: You're lying. You have to be... that's impossible.
Zoya!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Zoya... Listen to me. I'm telling the truth.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: You can't be. Dad said...
He said he'd protect us.
There's nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: I have the rest of the Guard garrison with me, and the Army is just outside the city too.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: We swore to protect this city, and this home.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Zoya, what do you want to be when you grow up?
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: You want to be like your papa? Haha, really? It's hard work.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Once you grow up, you'll understand all that Papa does. If that doesn't change your mind, then I'm looking forward to working with you, Zoya.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: It's true. He did say it.
His mission in life was to protect. To protect me and Mom, to protect the family, to...
'To protect this city.'
Don't cry.
You can't cry.
I want to be like him. I want to...
Zoya.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: ...I'm fine. Don't worry.
Keep going.
*Sigh...*
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: The point is, those awful Infected came out of nowhere, and there's too many of them.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Some of them seem to be restrained, but others are completely out of control, hellbent on razing the entire city.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: The Army has not come. But our comms are working fine. We have no idea what's going on with them.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: It's just us Guardsmen. There's not much we can do to stop them. But at least you'll be a little safer with us.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Oh, your father isn't with the squad now. He went over to Peterheim Middle School.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Peterheim...? Peterheim again...
What is he doing over there?
Haven't you heard? The Infected locked up another group of kids in Peterheim, just like your school.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: It's weird. They don't seem to be doing anything to them. No movement out of there.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: But there's been some news in the last few days. Reunion seems to be pulling out. No matter what they're up to, we have to have a countermeasure in place.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: We can't spare much manpower. Only a few districts are calm, and others are so out of control that we could only send a small team to Peterheim.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Meaning, my dad?
He volunteered. Your father's experienced. I'm not worried.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: And since you're safe and sound, he'll rest easy too. A shame we don't have a way to contact him...
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: We're short-handed everywhere. Damn it, what the hell's gotten into these Infected?!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Let's save the rest for later. We can't stay here any longer. There's no telling when the Army could show up... Where in hellfire is the Third Army when you need them?!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Anyway, Zoya, you take cover. Once the Army takes over, it'll be okay. This mob is no match for the soldiers of Ursus!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: And don't you worry. As soon as we free up some manpower, we'll send someone to Peterheim to rescue the students and pick up your father. Not to mention your school, all the schools.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: If... if no one else is free, I can go.
What?
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: I said, if you don't have any free hands, I can go get my dad!
Don't be stupid! That's way too dangerous! Absolutely not!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: You want to go alone? What help could you be?!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Uncle Valery!
I can tell we're in trouble here. And it looks like things are... they're getting worse, aren't they?
We don't have time to waste. The situation is getting more dangerous by the second. And if help isn't coming, you're only going to need more hands. So why not take mine?
I've watched how they operate at my school. I know how they patrol, I know how many men they put in a squad.
It's a different school, but their tactics should be pretty much the same...
I've been to Peterheim before. I know the campus layout. And I managed to dodge Reunion all the way here.
I can do this. I can help——
It's not the same!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Listen to me. This isn't anything like what you've seen at the police station. It's not a drill. It's nothing like you think.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Zoya, I know you're strong, I know you're skilled. But you're still a kidl. Your life has value! This is not for you to do!
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: I know. It's making things worse for everyone, and I probably can't help much at all.
But, but I...
But what else can I do?
I'll...
I'm scared to think. I have to act.
Please. Let me go...
*Sigh.*
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: It's not like you're going to listen to me anyway.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Sorry...
Take this.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Hm?
What is it...?
It's supposed to connect to military comm networks. I'm not sure if it still works.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: If you're lucky, you can make contact with the Army once you reach Peterheim. If you can report the situation to them from there, that would be a big help.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: I know I can't stop you. Honestly, I have too much on my plate right now to worry about watching you. What you do now is entirely on you.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: But... Zoya, bear in mind, you are not a public servant. We are here to protect you.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Don't be a hero. Protecting yourself is your first priority.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: Your father wouldn't want to see you in danger.
attributes.name: Valery

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
Thank you, Uncle Valery.
I'll definitely...
Definitely what?
I don't finish the sentence.
Because we both know that promises like that are just desperate attempts at mutual comfort.
I make my way through the crowd, dodging the collapsing rubble and avoiding the vicious men ruining the city.
I think of nothing. I dare not think. I just push on towards my goal.
(Phew, I'm here.)
(Peterheim Middle School... The last time I was here, it was an academic exchange thing.)
(Looks like the Reunion guys are pretty much the same. Hourly intervals using one patrol team... shouldn't be tough to clear them.)
(Nothing to worry about. But why is it so quiet?)
(Huh? What's that over there...?)
What is it?
(What the hell are they?!)
(These... these are... students?)
What in the world?
(Or, I guess I should say, these... were... students.)
(There's scorch marks on the floor and walls. Everything is charred... But these kids, they didn't burn to death...)
Edged weapons, blunt weapons, and trampling?
(Ugh, how could this have happened? And why?)
(Did Reunion do this? But these wounds don't look like those thugs' handiwork.)
(And these students should be useful to them. Reunion wouldn't want to hurt kids, would they?)
Hm? What's that...?
Huh...?
There on the scorched ground, among the many school uniforms, one note slips out of the score, crashing heavily on the piano keys.
It's a scene I never imagined. Not even in my darkest nightmares.
Isn't it about time for the weather to turn? Hey, Zoya, what do you think of this outfit?
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Oh? Something I've been planning with your mom for a while now. *Sigh,* I'm always in uniform. It's so hard for me to find other things to wear.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: You want to go too? No can do. Absolutely not.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: It's a date for me and your mom.
attributes.name: Man

attributes.content: Oh... oh...
Dad...?
Once the winter's over, when the weather turns, we'll have a little party, huh?
Drink some mead, cook some pancakes around the fire. We'll hold hands, sing, and dance in the muddy dirt. Even if the ground's still frozen, there'll be some little flowers blooming.
In this city, spring will come as usual.
Okay, formalities all taken care of.
attributes.name: Logistics Worker

attributes.content: Here's your registration card. You'll want to hold onto that.
attributes.name: Logistics Worker

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: (Great. All done.)
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: (It's easy enough, once you get used to it.)
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: (I'm hungry... Might as well refill my meal card.)
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: That was super fun! The Doctor is so good at cards. Didn't lose a single hand! And then taught me how to 'poof' out a coin! Like this... 'poof!'
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hehe, that is a lot of fun indeed. Let's get Leto to join next time?
attributes.name: Rosa

attributes.content: Huh? No thanks...
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: C'monnnn!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hey... Gummy. Inside voice.
attributes.name: Istina

attributes.content: Hmph. Who cares if she doesn't wanna go? She's just scared she'll lose to me.
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: What? Who's gonna lose? You wanna bet?! Let's see who's scared of who!
attributes.name: Leto

attributes.content: Screw around and find out!
attributes.name: Zima

attributes.content: Those uniforms... They're——
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: They're from Peterheim...!
